main event: An observation of an unidentified flying object resembling a huge bird that flapped its wings, reported by a retired Air Force Colonel near Alton, Illinois on April 11, 1948.
interesting points: The object was described as bigger than an airplane and resembling a huge fowl,The observer, Colonel Siegmund, did not see any flapping of wings but believed it was not a type of aircraft, A 12-year-old boy also reported seeing a similar bird three months earlier, The observation took place while horseback riding, No photographs were included in the report.
sighted object: A large object resembling a huge bird
witness description: A retired Air Force Colonel and a 12-year-old boy.
